titleStmt.title: Codex fragments of Frogs with abundant lectional signs

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Update meta as needed. TEXT: check spacing in r. 1; dot σ’ in r. 6 and remove space before scribal apostrophe (so also throughout); accent τὰ in r. 6; replace : with period in r. 6 before *dicolon*; insert paragraphos after r. 6; expand (Ξανθί(ας)) in r. 7; in r. 7 >> ὦ[νδρες; in r. 8 >> καὶ α[ὐτὸ]ς̣ [τ; fix faulty apostrophe at end of r. 8; something’s gone wrong with ἢν in r. 10; in r. 10 ῃ’ *apostrophe* should be ἦ̣\ι/ ; in r. 11 >> τοῦτ’; get the word break at end of r. 11; end of r. 12 is *high-punctus*; in r. 13 >> ὅμ̣ως; use the right apostrophe at beginning of r. 14; in r. 14 >> λῆμ̣α; end of r. 15 is *high-punctus*; remove lost.?lin at end of recto; accent Διός in v. 2; add space after period in v. 3; use lower-case φ in v. 3; use raised dot at end of v. 4 instead of semicolon (and check elsewhere for a similar mistake); replace colon at end of v. 7 with question mark; v. 8 >> δίκ[α]ιος; use raised dot instead of :*dicolon* in v. 8; in v. 8 ἢ ἂν νῷων should be γ’*apostrophe* ἂν νῶ ι(¨)ν ἴ(¨)δῃς; insert scribal asper in v. 10; replace colon with period at end of v. 10; replace bullets with raised dots; add *dicolon* at end of v. 12; νὼ in v. 13 should be ἡμᾶς; insert *dicolon* after δικαίως in v. 13; insert *high-punctus* at end of v. 13; add *dicolon* at end of v. 15; replace colon with semicolon at beginning of v. 16; aspirate οὐδ’ in v. 16; in v. 17 τονδὶ should be τονδ ὶ(¨); use period after πατάξω in v. 17; accent πηνίκα in v. 17; correct prodelision and use period for colon in v. 18; alpha not a in v. 18

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Update meta as needed. TEXT: check spacing in r. 1; dot σ’ in r. 6 and remove space before scribal apostrophe (so also throughout); accent τὰ in r. 6; replace : with period in r. 6 before *dicolon*; insert paragraphos after r. 6; expand (Ξανθί(ας)) in r. 7; in r. 7 >> ὦ[νδρες; in r. 8 >> καὶ α[ὐτὸ]ς̣ [τ; fix faulty apostrophe at end of r. 8; something’s gone wrong with ἢν in r. 10; in r. 10 ῃ’ *apostrophe* should be ἦ̣\ι/ ; in r. 11 >> τοῦτ’; get the word break at end of r. 11; end of r. 12 is *high-punctus*; in r. 13 >> ὅμ̣ως; use the right apostrophe at beginning of r. 14; in r. 14 >> λῆμ̣α; end of r. 15 is *high-punctus*; remove lost.?lin at end of recto; accent Διός in v. 2; add space after period in v. 3; use lower-case φ in v. 3; use raised dot at end of v. 4 instead of semicolon (and check elsewhere for a similar mistake); replace colon at end of v. 7 with question mark; v. 8 >> δίκ[α]ιος; use raised dot instead of :*dicolon* in v. 8; in v. 8 ἢ ἂν νῷων should be γ’*apostrophe* ἂν νῶ ι(¨)ν ἴ(¨)δῃς; insert scribal asper in v. 10; replace colon with period at end of v. 10; replace bullets with raised dots; add *dicolon* at end of v. 12; νὼ in v. 13 should be ἡμᾶς; insert *dicolon* after δικαίως in v. 13; insert *high-punctus* at end of v. 13; add *dicolon* at end of v. 15; replace colon with semicolon at beginning of v. 16; aspirate οὐδ’ in v. 16; in v. 17 τονδὶ should be τονδ ὶ(¨); use period after πατάξω in v. 17; accent πηνίκα in v. 17; correct prodelision and use period for colon in v. 18; alpha not a in v. 18
Submit - Encoded as part of coursework for C. M. Sampson at the University of Manitoba. Meta data has not been updated.
